descriptionHtml:
This mod is my first really serious mod, the tavern Wayrest Inn from the Dragonlance novels by Margret Weiss and Tracy Hickman. 

Just outside Riftens watchtowers, a little pine firest has grown up, and Tika Waylan has together with her husband Caramon built the Wayrest. Here you will meet Fisban, Laurana, Sturm and Tanis Half-elf. I\'ve also included a follower that I originally made for my father, the bulky Highelf Gaelar. ( He is not from the books, just a personal favourite of mine)

This is a BETA, so there are still some features to make, such as the followers. They are a bit buggy, due to Creation Kit <3 For now they are jsut followers, not bound by quests. Tried to make them as hirelings, but it just bugged out and dialogues vanished.
I also need to add my bard and do the Innkeeper scripting, so you can rent a bed.

Any tips, hints or feedback are more then welcome. I intend on making this as awesome as possible.

Personal thanks to DarkFox127, for the numberous of tutorials and problemsolving.
Enjoy.
//Emma
author: Wylda
